## Description {#details}

MatchContext can repurpose existing patterns to behave differently under a certain context.

For instance, <code>m&#95;Opc(ISD::ADD)</code> matches plain ADD nodes in normal circumstances, but matches VP&#95;ADD nodes under a custom <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpmatchcontext">VPMatchContext</a>. This design is meant to facilitate code / pattern reusing.

Definition at line 29 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/sdpatternmatch-h">SDPatternMatch.h</a>.
